name: cache
desc: JetLeaf Cache Library

name: jetleaf_resource
desc: JetLeaf Resource Library

name: Cache
desc:
Represents a single cache entry, encapsulating both the cached value
and its associated lifecycle metadata.

name: get
desc: Returns the actual value stored within this cache entry.

name: getAccessCount
desc:
Returns the total number of times this cache entry has been accessed
since creation.

name: getAgeInMilliseconds
desc:
Returns the total time in milliseconds since this cache entry was
first created and added to the cache.

name: getCreatedAt
desc:
Returns the timestamp representing when this cache entry was
originally created.

name: getLastAccessedAt
desc: Returns the timestamp representing when this entry was last accessed.

name: getRemainingTtl
desc:
Calculates and returns the remaining time-to-live for this entry,
i.e., how long until it expires.

name: getTimeSinceLastAccessInMilliseconds
desc:
Returns the elapsed time in milliseconds since the last access
to this cache entry.

name: getTtl
desc:
Returns the configured Time-To-Live (TTL) duration for this
cache entry, or null if the entry does not expire.

name: isExpired
desc:
Determines whether this cache entry has expired according to its
configured getTtl or custom expiration strategy.

name: recordAccess
desc: Records an access event for this cache entry.

name: CacheAnnotationMethodInterceptor
desc:
A composite ConditionalMethodInterceptor that transparently applies
caching behavior based on JetLeaf cache annotations such as
Cacheable, CachePut, and CacheEvict.

name: afterInvocation
desc: Invoked after the method execution completes, whether it succeeded or failed.

name: afterReturning
desc: Invoked after a successful method execution.

name: applicationContext
desc: The active JetLeaf ApplicationContext associated with this registrar.

name: aroundInvocation
desc:
Invoked around the target method execution, allowing interception
both before and after invocation.

name: beforeInvocation
desc: Executed immediately before the target method invocation.

name: cacheErrorHandler
desc: The configured error handler responsible for managing cache-related exceptions.

name: cacheResolver
desc: The user-provided resolver responsible for locating caches by name.

name: canIntercept
desc: Determines whether this interceptor can intercept the specified method.

name: keyGenerator
desc:
The KeyGenerator responsible for producing unique and consistent
cache keys for annotated method invocations.

name: CacheCapacityExceededException
desc:
Exception thrown when a cache exceeds its configured capacity and no
eviction policy is available to free up space.

name: CacheCapacityExceededException.new
desc: Creates a CacheCapacityExceededException with detailed context.

name: cacheName
desc: The name of the cache that exceeded its configured capacity.

name: maxEntries
desc: The configured maximum number of entries for the cache.

name: CacheClearEvent
desc: Event published when one or more entries in a cache are cleared.

name: CacheClearEvent.new
desc: Creates a new cache clear event.

name: entriesCleared
desc: The number of cache entries that were cleared.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: CacheComponentRegistrar
desc:
Central entry point for JetLeaf cache subsystem initialization and
configuration registration.

name: CacheComponentRegistrar.new
desc:
Central entry point for JetLeaf cache subsystem initialization and
configuration registration.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getPackageName
desc:
Represents an abstraction for identifying the package that an object,
resource, or service belongs to.

name: onApplicationEvent
desc: Handle an application event of type E.

name: onSingletonReady
desc: Callback interface triggered at the end of the singleton pre-instantiation phase.

name: setApplicationContext
desc: Sets the ApplicationContext that this component runs in.

name: setErrorHandler
desc: Sets the global CacheErrorHandler for the cache system.

name: supportsEventOf
desc: Returns true if the listener supports the given event.

name: CacheConfiguration
desc: Primary configuration class for the JetLeaf caching subsystem.

name: AUTO_CREATE_WHEN_NOT_FOUND
desc: Configuration property key that controls automatic cache creation.

name: CACHE_COMPONENT_REGISTRAR_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the CacheComponentRegistrar.

name: CACHE_CONFIGURATION_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the CacheConfiguration module.

name: CACHE_MANAGER_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the CacheManager.

name: CACHE_RESOLVER_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the CacheResolver.

name: CACHE_STORAGE_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the CacheStorage.

name: CacheConfiguration.new
desc: Primary configuration class for the JetLeaf caching subsystem.

name: ENABLE_EVENTS
desc: Property key enabling cache event emission.

name: ENABLE_METRICS
desc: Property key enabling cache metrics collection.

name: EVICTION_POLICY
desc: Property key controlling the cache eviction policy.

name: FAIL_IF_NOT_FOUND
desc: Configuration property key that determines failure behavior for missing caches.

name: LOGGABLE_CACHE_ERROR_HANDLER_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the LoggableCacheErrorHandler.

name: MAX_ENTRIES
desc: Property key defining the maximum number of entries allowed per cache.

name: THROWABLE_CACHE_ERROR_HANDLER_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the ThrowableCacheErrorHandler.

name: TIMEZONE
desc:
Property key defining the timezone used for expiration timestamps
and cache metrics reporting.

name: TTL
desc: Default property key defining the cache entry time-to-live (TTL) duration.

name: cacheComponentRegistrar
desc: Registers the CacheComponentRegistrar, the central entry point for cache subsystem initialization.

name: cacheManager
desc: Provides the default CacheManager when none is defined by the user.

name: cacheResolver
desc: Provides the default CacheResolver implementation when none is registered.

name: cacheStorage
desc: Provides the default CacheStorage implementation when no custom storage pod is defined.

name: loggableCacheErrorHandler
desc: Provides a loggable CacheErrorHandler if no other handler is configured.

name: throwableCacheErrorHandler
desc: Provides a throwable CacheErrorHandler that rethrows cache operation errors.

name: CacheConfigurer
desc: Contract for JetLeaf cache configuration contributors.

name: configure
desc: Configures a ConfigurableCacheStorage instance conditionally by name.

name: configureCacheManager
desc: Registers and configures cache managers.

name: configureCacheResolver
desc: Registers and configures cache resolvers.

name: configureCacheStorage
desc: Registers and configures cache storages.

name: configureErrorHandler
desc:
Called during cache subsystem initialization to allow custom
registration of cache-related components.

name: configureKeyGenerator
desc: Registers and configures cache key generators.

name: CacheErrorHandler
desc: A strategy interface for handling exceptions that occur during cache operations.

name: onClear
desc: Handles an error that occurred during a cache clear or invalidate operation.

name: onEvict
desc: Handles an error that occurred during a cache evict operation.

name: onGet
desc: Handles an error that occurred during a cache get operation.

name: onPut
desc: Handles an error that occurred during a cache put operation.

name: CacheErrorHandlerRegistry
desc: A central registry for all cache-related infrastructure components.

name: setErrorHandler
desc: Sets the global CacheErrorHandler for the cache system.

name: CacheEvent
desc: Base class representing an event related to a cache operation.

name: CacheEvent.new
desc: Creates a new cache event.

name: cacheName
desc: The name of the cache where this event occurred.

name: getPackageName
desc:
Represents an abstraction for identifying the package that an object,
resource, or service belongs to.

name: CacheEvict
desc: Marks a method that triggers the removal (or invalidation) of cache entries.

name: CacheEvict.new
desc: Creates a new CacheEvict annotation for cache invalidation methods.

name: allEntries
desc: If true, clears all entries from the cache instead of just the key.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: beforeInvocation
desc: If true, evicts before method execution; otherwise after.

name: CacheEvictEvent
desc: Event published when an entry is removed (evicted) from a cache.

name: CacheEvictEvent.new
desc: Creates a new cache evict event.

name: reason
desc: The reason why the cache entry was evicted.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: CacheEvictionPolicy
desc:
Represents a cache eviction strategy for determining which cache entry
should be removed when the cache reaches capacity or when specific
conditions are met.

name: determineEvictionCandidate
desc: Determines which entry in the cache should be evicted.

name: getName
desc: Returns a descriptive name for this eviction policy.

name: CacheException
desc: Represents a runtime exception that occurs during cache operations.

name: CacheException.new
desc: Creates a new CacheException.

name: CacheExpireEvent
desc: Event published when a cache entry expires due to reaching its TTL (time-to-live).

name: CacheExpireEvent.new
desc: Creates a new cache expiration event.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: ttl
desc: The time-to-live (TTL) duration that caused the expiration.

name: value
desc: The value of the cache entry that expired.

name: CacheHitEvent
desc: Event published when a cached value is successfully retrieved.

name: CacheHitEvent.new
desc: Creates a new cache hit event.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: value
desc: The value that was retrieved from the cache.

name: CacheManager
desc: Manages multiple CacheStorage instances and provides lookup by name.

name: clearAll
desc: Clears all caches managed by this cache manager.

name: destroy
desc: Destroys all caches and releases resources.

name: getCache
desc: Retrieves a cache by name.

name: getCacheNames
desc: Returns the names of all caches managed by this cache manager.

name: CacheManagerRegistry
desc: A registry contract for managing multiple CacheManager pods within JetLeaf.

name: addManager
desc: Registers a CacheManager pod with this registry.

name: CacheMetrics
desc: An abstract interface class for collecting and reporting cache-related metrics.

name: buildGraph
desc: Builds a structured graph representation of the cache state and recent operations.

name: getHitRate
desc: Returns the cache hit rate as a percentage (0.0–100.0).

name: getNumberOfPutOperations
desc: Returns the total number of put operations.

name: getTotalNumberOfAccesses
desc: Returns the total number of accesses, which is the sum of hits and misses.

name: getTotalNumberOfEvictions
desc: Returns the total number of evictions that have occurred.

name: getTotalNumberOfExpirations
desc: Returns the total number of cache expirations that have occurred.

name: getTotalNumberOfHits
desc: Returns the total number of cache hits.

name: getTotalNumberOfMisses
desc: Returns the total number of cache misses.

name: recordEviction
desc: Records the eviction of a cache entry identified by key.

name: recordExpiration
desc: Records the expiration of a cache entry identified by key.

name: recordHit
desc: Records a successful cache hit for the given key.

name: recordMiss
desc: Records a cache miss for the specified key.

name: recordPut
desc: Records a cache write (insert or update) operation for the given key.

name: reset
desc: Resets all metrics to zero, clearing the historical statistics.

name: CacheMissEvent
desc: Event published when a cache lookup fails to find a value.

name: CacheMissEvent.new
desc: Creates a new cache miss event.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: CacheOperation
desc: Defines the contract for a cache operation within the JetLeaf caching subsystem.

name: execute
desc: Executes this cache operation with the provided CacheOperationContext.

name: CacheOperationContext
desc:
Defines the execution context for a cache operation within JetLeaf’s
caching subsystem.

name: generateKey
desc: Generates a unique cache key for the current method invocation.

name: getCachedResult
desc: Retrieves the cached result associated with the current context.

name: getMethodInvocation
desc: Returns the reflective method invocation associated with this context.

name: getResult
desc: Retrieves the actual result from the target method invocation.

name: hasCachedResult
desc: Returns true if a cached result was found.

name: hasResult
desc: Returns true if the target method produced a result.

name: isCacheMiss
desc: Returns true if the current invocation resulted in a cache miss.

name: setCacheMiss
desc: Marks the context as a cache miss.

name: setCachedResult
desc: Records a retrieved value from the cache.

name: setResult
desc: Sets the result produced by the target method.

name: CachePut
desc: Marks a method whose result should always be stored (or updated) in the cache.

name: CachePut.new
desc: Creates a new CachePut annotation for cache-update methods.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: CachePutEvent
desc: Event published when a value is stored in a cache.

name: CachePutEvent.new
desc: Creates a new cache put event.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: ttl
desc: The TTL (time-to-live) applied to this cached entry, if any.

name: value
desc: The value that was stored in the cache.

name: CacheResolver
desc:
Strategy interface for resolving one or more CacheStorage instances
associated with a particular Cacheable operation.

name: resolveCaches
desc: Resolves the CacheStorage instances to be used for a given Cacheable operation.

name: CacheResolverRegistry
desc: A registry contract for managing multiple CacheResolver pods within JetLeaf.

name: addResolver
desc: Adds a CacheResolver pod to this registry.

name: CacheStorage
desc: The core abstraction representing a single named cache.

name: clear
desc: Removes all entries from the cache.

name: evict
desc: Removes a specific entry from the cache.

name: evictIfPresent
desc: Removes a specific entry from the cache if it exists.

name: get
desc: Retrieves a value from the cache.

name: getAs
desc: Retrieves a value from the cache with type casting.

name: getName
desc: Returns the cache name.

name: getResource
desc: Returns the underlying native cache provider.

name: invalidate
desc:
Invalidates the cache, clearing all entries and potentially
resetting internal state.

name: put
desc: Stores a value in the cache.

name: putIfAbsent
desc: Stores a value in the cache only if the key is not already present.

name: CacheStorageRegistry
desc: Defines a registry contract for managing CacheStorage instances.

name: addStorage
desc: Registers a CacheStorage instance within the registry.

name: Cacheable
desc: Marks a method as cacheable — its result will be stored in one or more caches.

name: Cacheable.new
desc: Creates a new Cacheable annotation for cacheable methods.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: cacheManager
desc: Optional custom cache manager name

name: cacheNames
desc: The names of the caches to use for this operation.

name: cacheResolver
desc: Optional custom cache resolver name

name: condition
desc: The condition that must be satisfied for caching to occur.

name: keyGenerator
desc: Optional custom key generator name

name: ttl
desc: The time-to-live (TTL) duration for this cache entry.

name: unless
desc: The condition that, if true, prevents caching.

name: CompositeKeyGenerator
desc:
A composite KeyGenerator that aggregates and coordinates multiple
KeyGenerator pods registered within the JetLeaf application context.

name: CompositeKeyGenerator.new
desc:
A composite KeyGenerator that aggregates and coordinates multiple
KeyGenerator pods registered within the JetLeaf application context.

name: addKeyGenerator
desc:
Registers a KeyGenerator responsible for producing cache keys from
annotated method invocations.

name: generate
desc:
Generates a unique and deterministic cache key for the given
method invocation.

name: getPackageName
desc:
Represents an abstraction for identifying the package that an object,
resource, or service belongs to.

name: onReady
desc:
Interface to be implemented by pods that require initialization logic
after their properties have been set by the container.

name: setPodFactory
desc: Sets the PodFactory that created and manages this component.

name: ConcurrentMapCacheResource
desc:
A concurrent in-memory cache resource based on HashMap, implementing
the Resource interface.

name: ConcurrentMapCacheStorage
desc: A thread-safe, in-memory cache implementation backed by a concurrent ConcurrentMapCacheResource.

name: ConcurrentMapCacheStorage.named
desc:
Creates a new ConcurrentMapCacheStorage instance with a custom cache name
and an associated metrics tracker.

name: ConcurrentMapCacheStorage.new
desc: A thread-safe, in-memory cache implementation backed by a concurrent ConcurrentMapCacheResource.

name: clear
desc: Removes all entries from the cache.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: evict
desc: Removes a specific entry from the cache.

name: evictIfPresent
desc: Removes a specific entry from the cache if it exists.

name: get
desc: Retrieves a value from the cache.

name: getAs
desc: Retrieves a value from the cache with type casting.

name: getDefaultTtl
desc: Retrieves the default Time-To-Live (TTL) duration applied to new cache entries.

name: getEvictionPolicy
desc: Defines configuration capabilities for a cache storage implementation.

name: getMaxEntries
desc: Retrieves the maximum number of entries that this cache can hold before eviction.

name: getMetrics
desc: Returns the CacheMetrics instance associated with this cache.

name: getName
desc: Returns the cache name.

name: getPackageName
desc:
Represents an abstraction for identifying the package that an object,
resource, or service belongs to.

name: getResource
desc: Returns the underlying native cache provider.

name: getZoneId
desc: Retrieves the ZoneId used by this cache for time-based computations.

name: invalidate
desc:
Invalidates the cache, clearing all entries and potentially
resetting internal state.

name: onSingletonReady
desc: Callback interface triggered at the end of the singleton pre-instantiation phase.

name: put
desc: Stores a value in the cache.

name: putIfAbsent
desc: Stores a value in the cache only if the key is not already present.

name: setApplicationContext
desc: Sets the ApplicationContext that this component runs in.

name: setDefaultTtl
desc: Sets the default Time-To-Live (TTL) for cache entries.

name: setEvictionPolicy
desc: Sets the CacheEvictionPolicy that determines how cache entries are removed.

name: setMaxEntries
desc: Defines the maximum number of entries this cache may hold at once.

name: setZoneId
desc: Configures the time zone used for all time-sensitive cache operations.

name: ConcurrentMapRateLimitResource
desc: A thread-safe in-memory resource for storing rate limit entries.

name: ConcurrentMapRateLimitStorage
desc:
A thread-safe, in-memory rate-limit storage implementation backed by a
concurrent ConcurrentMapRateLimitResource.

name: ConcurrentMapRateLimitStorage.named
desc:
A thread-safe, in-memory rate-limit storage implementation backed by a
concurrent ConcurrentMapRateLimitResource.

name: ConcurrentMapRateLimitStorage.new
desc:
A thread-safe, in-memory rate-limit storage implementation backed by a
concurrent ConcurrentMapRateLimitResource.

name: clear
desc: Clears all rate-limit tracking data across all identifiers.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getMetrics
desc: Returns the metrics associated with this rate limit storage.

name: getName
desc: Returns the canonical name of this RateLimitStorage instance.

name: getPackageName
desc:
Represents an abstraction for identifying the package that an object,
resource, or service belongs to.

name: getRemainingRequests
desc: Calculates how many requests remain before the rate limit is reached.

name: getRequestCount
desc: Retrieves the current number of requests recorded for the given identifier.

name: getResetTime
desc: Returns the timestamp when the rate-limit window will reset for a given identifier.

name: getResource
desc: Returns the underlying native rate-limit provider object.

name: getRetryAfter
desc:
Calculates and returns the remaining duration before the current
rate limit window resets for the given identifier.

name: getZoneId
desc:
Retrieves the currently active ZoneId used by this storage for
all time-sensitive computations such as:

name: invalidate
desc: Invalidates the current rate-limit storage and cleans up its resources.

name: onSingletonReady
desc: Callback interface triggered at the end of the singleton pre-instantiation phase.

name: recordRequest
desc: Records a successful request for the given identifier.

name: reset
desc: Resets the rate-limit state for a specific identifier.

name: setApplicationContext
desc: Sets the ApplicationContext that this component runs in.

name: setZoneId
desc:
Represents a configurable rate-limit storage that allows runtime tuning
of critical operational parameters, primarily the time zone used for
window tracking and expiration calculations.

name: tryConsume
desc: Determines whether a request is permitted under the defined rate limit.

name: ConditionalKeyGenerator
desc:
A specialized KeyGenerator that can conditionally participate in key generation
based on runtime or reflective characteristics of a method invocation.

name: canGenerate
desc:
Determines whether this key generator can handle the given method
for the specified target.

name: ConfigurableCacheStorage
desc: Defines configuration capabilities for a cache storage implementation.

name: setDefaultTtl
desc: Sets the default Time-To-Live (TTL) for cache entries.

name: setEvictionPolicy
desc: Sets the CacheEvictionPolicy that determines how cache entries are removed.

name: setMaxEntries
desc: Defines the maximum number of entries this cache may hold at once.

name: setZoneId
desc: Configures the time zone used for all time-sensitive cache operations.

name: ConfigurableRateLimitStorage
desc:
Represents a configurable rate-limit storage that allows runtime tuning
of critical operational parameters, primarily the time zone used for
window tracking and expiration calculations.

name: setZoneId
desc:
Represents a configurable rate-limit storage that allows runtime tuning
of critical operational parameters, primarily the time zone used for
window tracking and expiration calculations.

name: EnableResource
desc:
Annotation used to enable JetLeaf resource and caching infrastructure
within an application context.

name: EnableResource.new
desc:
Annotation used to enable JetLeaf resource and caching infrastructure
within an application context.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the type of this annotation.

name: EnvMatchType
desc: Defines how a WhenEnv condition compares an environment value.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: FifoEvictionPolicy
desc:
A First-In-First-Out (FIFO) cache eviction policy that removes
the oldest entry from the cache when eviction is necessary.

name: FifoEvictionPolicy.new
desc: Creates a new instance of the FIFO eviction policy.

name: determineEvictionCandidate
desc: Determines which entry in the cache should be evicted.

name: getName
desc: Returns a descriptive name for this eviction policy.

name: KeyGenerator
desc: KeyGenerator — Strategy for Cache Key Generation

name: generate
desc:
Generates a unique and deterministic cache key for the given
method invocation.

name: KeyGeneratorRegistry
desc:
Central registry interface for managing KeyGenerator pods within the
JetLeaf caching subsystem.

name: addKeyGenerator
desc:
Registers a KeyGenerator responsible for producing cache keys from
annotated method invocations.

name: LfuEvictionPolicy
desc:
A Least-Frequently-Used (LFU) cache eviction policy for managing
cache memory efficiently by evicting the entries that are accessed least often.

name: LfuEvictionPolicy.new
desc: Creates a new LFU eviction policy instance.

name: determineEvictionCandidate
desc: Determines which entry in the cache should be evicted.

name: getName
desc: Returns a descriptive name for this eviction policy.

name: LoggableCacheErrorHandler
desc: A CacheErrorHandler implementation that logs all cache operation failures.

name: LoggableCacheErrorHandler.new
desc:
Creates a new LoggableCacheErrorHandler that delegates all cache errors
to the provided _logger.

name: onClear
desc: Handles an error that occurred during a cache clear or invalidate operation.

name: onEvict
desc: Handles an error that occurred during a cache evict operation.

name: onGet
desc: Handles an error that occurred during a cache get operation.

name: onPut
desc: Handles an error that occurred during a cache put operation.

name: LruEvictionPolicy
desc:
A Least-Recently-Used (LRU) cache eviction policy that removes the cache
entry that has not been accessed for the longest time when eviction is required.

name: LruEvictionPolicy.new
desc: Creates a new LRU eviction policy instance.

name: determineEvictionCandidate
desc: Determines which entry in the cache should be evicted.

name: getName
desc: Returns a descriptive name for this eviction policy.

name: NoCacheFoundException
desc: Thrown when a requested cache entry cannot be found.

name: NoCacheFoundException.new
desc: Creates a new NoCacheFoundException.

name: key
desc: The cache key that was not found.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: NoRateLimitFoundException
desc:
Exception thrown when a requested rate-limit configuration or storage
cannot be found within the active RateLimitManager or resolver chain.

name: NoRateLimitFoundException.named
desc:
Factory-style convenience constructor that creates a
NoRateLimitFoundException using the given name.

name: NoRateLimitFoundException.new
desc:
Exception thrown when a requested rate-limit configuration or storage
cannot be found within the active RateLimitManager or resolver chain.

name: name
desc: The logical name or identifier of the missing rate limit.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: OperationContext
desc:
A central contract in JetLeaf representing the operational context
available to runtime components, interceptors, and infrastructure extensions.

name: getEnvironment
desc: Returns the active Environment associated with the current operation.

name: getPodFactory
desc: Returns the ConfigurableListablePodFactory associated with this context.

name: RateLimit
desc: Annotation that marks a method to be subject to rate limiting.

name: RateLimit.new
desc: Creates a new RateLimit annotation defining rate limiting behavior.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: condition
desc: The activation condition for the rate limit.

name: keyGenerator
desc: The optional name of a custom KeyGenerator pod.

name: limit
desc: The maximum number of requests allowed within the configured window.

name: rateLimitManager
desc: The optional name of a custom RateLimitManager.

name: rateLimitResolver
desc: The optional name of a custom RateLimitResolver.

name: storageNames
desc: The names of the RateLimitStorage instances to use for this operation.

name: unless
desc: The disabling condition for the rate limit.

name: window
desc: The duration representing the rate limit window.

name: RateLimitAllowedEvent
desc: Event published when a request is allowed under the configured rate limit.

name: RateLimitAllowedEvent.new
desc: Creates a new event indicating that a request was allowed by the rate limiter.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: RateLimitAnnotationMethodInterceptor
desc:
A composite ConditionalMethodInterceptor that transparently applies
rate limiting behavior based on JetLeaf @RateLimit annotations.

name: afterThrowing
desc: Executed when a target method throws an exception.

name: applicationContext
desc: The active JetLeaf ApplicationContext associated with this registrar.

name: aroundInvocation
desc:
Invoked around the target method execution, allowing interception
both before and after invocation.

name: beforeInvocation
desc: Executed immediately before the target method invocation.

name: canIntercept
desc: Determines whether this interceptor can intercept the specified method.

name: keyGenerator
desc:
The KeyGenerator responsible for producing unique and consistent
rate-limit keys for annotated method invocations.

name: rateLimitResolver
desc: The resolver responsible for locating target RateLimitStorage instances by name.

name: throwExceptionOnExceeded
desc:
Indicates whether the rate-limit operation should throw a
RateLimitExceededException when a limit is exceeded.

name: RateLimitClearEvent
desc:
Event published when all request counters for a given rate limit bucket
or storage have been cleared.

name: RateLimitClearEvent.new
desc: Creates a new event indicating that a rate limit storage or bucket has been cleared.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: totalCount
desc: The total number of requests that were cleared from the rate limit storage.

name: RateLimitComponentRegistrar
desc:
A specialized RateLimitAnnotationMethodInterceptor that integrates
rate-limit enforcement with the JetLeaf application lifecycle.

name: RateLimitComponentRegistrar.new
desc:
Creates a new RateLimitComponentRegistrar with the given
KeyGenerator and RateLimitResolver.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getOrder
desc: A contract for objects that are assigned an order or precedence value.

name: onApplicationEvent
desc: Handle an application event of type E.

name: setApplicationContext
desc: Sets the ApplicationContext that this component runs in.

name: supportsEventOf
desc: Returns true if the listener supports the given event.

name: RateLimitConfiguration
desc: Central configuration class for the JetLeaf Rate-Limit subsystem.

name: AUTO_CREATE_WHEN_NOT_FOUND
desc: Configuration property key that controls automatic rate-limit creation.

name: ENABLE_EVENTS
desc: Property key enabling rate-limit event emission.

name: ENABLE_METRICS
desc: Property key enabling rate-limit metrics collection.

name: FAIL_IF_NOT_FOUND
desc: Configuration property key that determines failure behavior for missing rateLimits.

name: RATE_LIMIT_COMPONENT_REGISTRAR_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the RateLimitComponentRegistrar.

name: RATE_LIMIT_CONFIGURATION_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the RateLimitConfiguration.

name: RATE_LIMIT_MANAGER_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the RateLimitManager.

name: RATE_LIMIT_RESOLVER_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the RateLimitResolver.

name: RATE_LIMIT_STORAGE_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the RateLimitStorage.

name: ROLLBACK_RATE_LIMIT_STORAGE_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the RollBackRateLimitStorage.

name: RateLimitConfiguration.new
desc: Central configuration class for the JetLeaf Rate-Limit subsystem.

name: TIMEZONE
desc:
Property key defining the timezone used for expiration timestamps
and rate-limit metrics reporting.

name: rateLimitComponentRegistrar
desc: Registers the RateLimitComponentRegistrar, the central entry point for rateLimit subsystem initialization.

name: rateLimitManager
desc: Provides the default RateLimitManager when none is defined by the user.

name: rateLimitResolver
desc: Provides the default RateLimitResolver implementation when none is registered.

name: rateLimitStorage
desc: Provides the default RateLimitStorage implementation when no custom storage pod is defined.

name: RateLimitConfigurer
desc: Defines the programmatic configuration entry point for the rate-limiting subsystem.

name: configure
desc: Configures a ConfigurableRateLimitStorage instance conditionally by name.

name: configureRateLimitManager
desc: Configures and registers one or more RateLimitManager instances.

name: configureRateLimitResolver
desc: Configures and registers RateLimitResolver implementations.

name: configureRateLimitStorage
desc: Configures and registers RateLimitStorage implementations.

name: RateLimitDeniedEvent
desc: Event published when a request is denied due to exceeding the configured rate limit.

name: RateLimitDeniedEvent.new
desc: Creates a new event indicating the request was denied due to exceeding the rate limit.

name: retryAfter
desc: The remaining time until the request may be retried.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: RateLimitEntry
desc: Represents a single tracked rate limit record within a RateLimitStorage.

name: getCount
desc: Returns the current request count within the active rate limit window.

name: getResetTime
desc: Returns the exact time when the rate limit window will reset.

name: getRetryAfter
desc:
Calculates and returns the remaining duration before the current
rate limit window resets for the given identifier.

name: getTimeStamp
desc: Returns the timestamp when this rate limit entry was created or last updated.

name: getWindowDuration
desc: Returns the configured rate limit window for this storage.

name: getWindowKey
desc: Returns a unique key representing this rate limit window.

name: isExpired
desc: Determines whether the rate limit entry has expired.

name: reset
desc: Resets all entry data to zero, clearing the historical statistics.

name: RateLimitEvent
desc: Base class for all rate limit events in JetLeaf.

name: RateLimitEvent.new
desc: Creates a new rate limit event.

name: getPackageName
desc:
Represents an abstraction for identifying the package that an object,
resource, or service belongs to.

name: limitName
desc: The name of the rate-limited resource or bucket.

name: RateLimitExceededException
desc: Exception thrown when a rate limit is exceeded.

name: RateLimitExceededException.new
desc: Exception thrown when a rate limit is exceeded.

name: RateLimitExceededException.result
desc: Exception thrown when a rate limit is exceeded.

name: cause
desc: The underlying cause of this exception, if any.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getCause
desc: The cause of this exception, if any.

name: getMessage
desc: The message associated with this exception.

name: getStackTrace
desc: The stack trace associated with this exception.

name: isFullyExhausted
desc: Whether the rate limit has been completely exhausted (remaining == 0).

name: message
desc: The message describing the error.

name: remaining
desc: The number of remaining requests in the current window.

name: stackTrace
desc: The associated stack trace.

name: toHttpHeaders
desc: Creates headers for HTTP responses.

name: toMap
desc: Converts the exception to a map for serialization.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: usageRatio
desc: The ratio of used requests to the limit (0.0 to 1.0).

name: RateLimitManager
desc:
The RateLimitManager interface defines the orchestration layer for managing
multiple RateLimitStorage instances within JetLeaf’s traffic control
subsystem.

name: clearAll
desc: Clears all rate-limit data across every managed RateLimitStorage.

name: destroy
desc: Destroys all managed RateLimitStorage instances and releases their resources.

name: getStorage
desc: Retrieves a RateLimitStorage instance by its unique name.

name: getStorageNames
desc: Returns the names of all currently managed RateLimitStorage instances.

name: RateLimitManagerRegistry
desc: Registry for managing and exposing RateLimitManager instances.

name: addManager
desc: Adds a new RateLimitManager to the registry.

name: RateLimitMetrics
desc: Defines the contract for recording and reporting rate limit activity metrics.

name: buildGraph
desc: Builds a structured, JSON-compatible representation of the rate limit metrics.

name: decrementAllowed
desc: Decrements the allowed request counter for the specified identifier.

name: decrementDenied
desc: Decrements the denied request counter for the specified identifier.

name: getAllowedRequests
desc: Returns the total number of allowed (non-denied) requests recorded.

name: getDeniedRequests
desc: Returns the total number of denied requests recorded.

name: getLastUpdated
desc: Returns the timestamp of the last metric update.

name: getName
desc: Returns the logical name of the rate limit metric instance.

name: getResets
desc: Returns the total number of reset events recorded.

name: recordAllowed
desc: Records an allowed request for the specified identifier.

name: recordDenied
desc: Records a denied request for the specified identifier.

name: recordReset
desc: Records a rate limit reset event for the specified identifier.

name: reset
desc: Resets all metrics to zero, clearing accumulated statistics.

name: RateLimitOperationContext
desc:
Context object representing the state and behavior of a rate-limited
method invocation or resource access.

name: generateKey
desc: Generates a unique key for the current rate-limited entity.

name: getMethodInvocation
desc: Returns the underlying method invocation metadata (target, arguments, etc.).

name: RateLimitResetEvent
desc: Event published when a rate limit window has been reset for a particular entity.

name: RateLimitResetEvent.new
desc: Creates a new event indicating the rate limit window has been reset.

name: resetTime
desc: The timestamp when the rate limit was reset.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: RateLimitResolver
desc:
The RateLimitResolver defines the strategy contract for resolving one or more
RateLimitStorage instances for a specific RateLimit operation.

name: resolveStorages
desc:
Resolves the appropriate RateLimitStorage instances for a given
RateLimit operation.

name: RateLimitResolverRegistry
desc: Registry for managing RateLimitResolver instances.

name: addResolver
desc: Adds a RateLimitResolver to the registry.

name: RateLimitResult
desc: Represents the outcome of a rate-limit check for a specific identifier.

name: RateLimitResult.new
desc: Creates a new RateLimitResult instance.

name: allowed
desc: Indicates whether the current request is allowed under the rate limit.

name: currentCount
desc: The current number of requests in the window.

name: identifier
desc: The entity that exceeded or is subject to the rate limit.

name: limit
desc: The maximum allowed requests in the window.

name: limitName
desc: The name of the rate limit bucket or rule.

name: remainingCount
desc: The current number of requests remaining in the window.

name: resetTime
desc: When the rate limit will reset.

name: retryAfter
desc: How long to wait before retrying.

name: window
desc: The duration of the rate limit window.

name: zoneId
desc: The time zone used for reset calculations.

name: RateLimitStorage
desc:
The RateLimitStorage interface defines the abstraction for JetLeaf’s
rate-limiting persistence and quota tracking mechanism.

name: clear
desc: Clears all rate-limit tracking data across all identifiers.

name: getMetrics
desc: Returns the metrics associated with this rate limit storage.

name: getName
desc: Returns the canonical name of this RateLimitStorage instance.

name: getRemainingRequests
desc: Calculates how many requests remain before the rate limit is reached.

name: getRequestCount
desc: Retrieves the current number of requests recorded for the given identifier.

name: getResetTime
desc: Returns the timestamp when the rate-limit window will reset for a given identifier.

name: getResource
desc: Returns the underlying native rate-limit provider object.

name: getRetryAfter
desc:
Calculates and returns the remaining duration before the current
rate limit window resets for the given identifier.

name: invalidate
desc: Invalidates the current rate-limit storage and cleans up its resources.

name: recordRequest
desc: Records a successful request for the given identifier.

name: reset
desc: Resets the rate-limit state for a specific identifier.

name: tryConsume
desc: Determines whether a request is permitted under the defined rate limit.

name: RateLimitStorageRegistry
desc: Central registry for managing RateLimitStorage instances.

name: addStorage
desc: Registers a new RateLimitStorage instance into the registry.

name: Resource
desc: Represents the contract for any JetLeaf-backed storage mechanism.

name: ResourceAutoConfiguration
desc: Auto-configuration entry point for JetLeaf resource and key generation infrastructure.

name: COMPOSITE_KEY_GENERATOR_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the CompositeKeyGenerator.

name: KEY_GENERATOR_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the SimpleKeyGenerator.

name: RESOURCE_AUTO_CONFIGURATION_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the ResourceAutoConfiguration module.

name: ResourceAutoConfiguration.new
desc: Auto-configuration entry point for JetLeaf resource and key generation infrastructure.

name: compositeKeyGenerator
desc:
Registers the CompositeKeyGenerator as the active KeyGenerator
when the configuration property jetleaf.resource.key-generator
is set to "composite" or is missing.

name: simpleKeyGenerator
desc:
Registers the SimpleKeyGenerator as the active KeyGenerator when
no custom generator is present and the configuration property
jetleaf.resource.key-generator is set to "default".

name: ResourceCondition
desc: Defines a generalized conditional policy for applying resource-level operations.

name: shouldApply
desc: Determines whether the operation should be subjected to a resource policy.

name: RollbackCapableRateLimitStorage
desc:
An in-memory rate-limit storage variant that supports best-effort rollback of
a prior successful consume.

name: RollbackCapableRateLimitStorage.named
desc:
An in-memory rate-limit storage variant that supports best-effort rollback of
a prior successful consume.

name: RollbackCapableRateLimitStorage.new
desc:
An in-memory rate-limit storage variant that supports best-effort rollback of
a prior successful consume.

name: rollbackConsume
desc: Best-effort rollback: decrement the counter for the given identifier and window.

name: SimpleCacheManager
desc: A composite registry and coordinator for multiple CacheManager implementations within JetLeaf.

name: SimpleCacheManager.new
desc: A composite registry and coordinator for multiple CacheManager implementations within JetLeaf.

name: addManager
desc: Registers a CacheManager pod with this registry.

name: addStorage
desc: Registers a CacheStorage instance within the registry.

name: clearAll
desc: Clears all caches managed by this cache manager.

name: destroy
desc: Destroys all caches and releases resources.

name: getCache
desc: Retrieves a cache by name.

name: getCacheNames
desc: Returns the names of all caches managed by this cache manager.

name: getPackageName
desc:
Represents an abstraction for identifying the package that an object,
resource, or service belongs to.

name: onReady
desc:
Interface to be implemented by pods that require initialization logic
after their properties have been set by the container.

name: setApplicationContext
desc: Sets the ApplicationContext that this component runs in.

name: setPodFactory
desc: Sets the PodFactory that created and manages this component.

name: SimpleCacheResolver
desc:
Default JetLeaf implementation of the CacheResolver interface, providing
a simple yet extensible mechanism for resolving Cacheable annotations
to their corresponding CacheStorage instances.

name: SimpleCacheResolver.new
desc:
Default JetLeaf implementation of the CacheResolver interface, providing
a simple yet extensible mechanism for resolving Cacheable annotations
to their corresponding CacheStorage instances.

name: addResolver
desc: Adds a CacheResolver pod to this registry.

name: getPackageName
desc:
Represents an abstraction for identifying the package that an object,
resource, or service belongs to.

name: onReady
desc:
Interface to be implemented by pods that require initialization logic
after their properties have been set by the container.

name: resolveCaches
desc: Resolves the CacheStorage instances to be used for a given Cacheable operation.

name: setPodFactory
desc: Sets the PodFactory that created and manages this component.

name: SimpleKeyGenerator
desc:
A lightweight KeyGenerator implementation that delegates directly to the
base key generation strategy defined in KeyGenerator.

name: SimpleKeyGenerator.new
desc:
A lightweight KeyGenerator implementation that delegates directly to the
base key generation strategy defined in KeyGenerator.

name: SimpleRateLimitManager
desc:
A composite RateLimitManager implementation that manages discovery,
registration, and resolution of RateLimitStorage instances.

name: SimpleRateLimitManager.new
desc:
A composite RateLimitManager implementation that manages discovery,
registration, and resolution of RateLimitStorage instances.

name: addManager
desc: Adds a new RateLimitManager to the registry.

name: addStorage
desc: Registers a new RateLimitStorage instance into the registry.

name: clearAll
desc: Clears all rate-limit data across every managed RateLimitStorage.

name: destroy
desc: Destroys all managed RateLimitStorage instances and releases their resources.

name: getPackageName
desc:
Represents an abstraction for identifying the package that an object,
resource, or service belongs to.

name: getStorage
desc: Retrieves a RateLimitStorage instance by its unique name.

name: getStorageNames
desc: Returns the names of all currently managed RateLimitStorage instances.

name: onReady
desc:
Interface to be implemented by pods that require initialization logic
after their properties have been set by the container.

name: setApplicationContext
desc: Sets the ApplicationContext that this component runs in.

name: setPodFactory
desc: Sets the PodFactory that created and manages this component.

name: SimpleRateLimitResolver
desc:
A simple, composite RateLimitResolver implementation that delegates
storage resolution to a chain of configured resolvers and a primary
RateLimitManager fallback.

name: SimpleRateLimitResolver.new
desc:
A simple, composite RateLimitResolver implementation that delegates
storage resolution to a chain of configured resolvers and a primary
RateLimitManager fallback.

name: addResolver
desc: Adds a RateLimitResolver to the registry.

name: getPackageName
desc:
Represents an abstraction for identifying the package that an object,
resource, or service belongs to.

name: onReady
desc:
Interface to be implemented by pods that require initialization logic
after their properties have been set by the container.

name: resolveStorages
desc:
Resolves the appropriate RateLimitStorage instances for a given
RateLimit operation.

name: setPodFactory
desc: Sets the PodFactory that created and manages this component.

name: ThrowableCacheErrorHandler
desc:
A strict CacheErrorHandler implementation that immediately rethrows any
exception encountered during cache operations.

name: ThrowableCacheErrorHandler.new
desc: Creates a new ThrowableCacheErrorHandler.

name: onClear
desc: Handles an error that occurred during a cache clear or invalidate operation.

name: onEvict
desc: Handles an error that occurred during a cache evict operation.

name: onGet
desc: Handles an error that occurred during a cache get operation.

name: onPut
desc: Handles an error that occurred during a cache put operation.

name: WhenAll
desc:
A composite ResourceCondition that evaluates to true only if both
the left and right conditions evaluate to true.

name: WhenAll.new
desc:
Creates a composite AND condition that requires both left and right
to evaluate to true for the resource operation to apply.

name: left
desc: The left-hand condition in the logical conjunction.

name: right
desc: The right-hand condition in the logical conjunction.

name: shouldApply
desc: Evaluates the combined condition:

name: WhenAlways
desc: A ResourceCondition that always evaluates to true.

name: WhenAlways.new
desc: Creates an unconditional WhenAlways condition.

name: shouldApply
desc: Always returns true, indicating the operation should apply.

name: WhenAny
desc:
A composite ResourceCondition that evaluates to true if either
the left or right condition evaluates to true.

name: WhenAny.new
desc:
Creates a composite OR condition that evaluates to true if either
left or right evaluates to true.

name: left
desc: The left-hand condition in the logical disjunction.

name: right
desc: The right-hand condition in the logical disjunction.

name: shouldApply
desc: Evaluates the combined condition:

name: WhenEnv
desc: A ResourceCondition that evaluates based on environment variables.

name: WhenEnv.new
desc: Creates a new WhenEnv condition.

name: key
desc: The environment variable key to check.

name: match
desc: The comparison mode.

name: shouldApply
desc: Determines whether the operation should be subjected to a resource policy.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: value
desc: The optional value to compare with or match against.

name: WhenNever
desc: A ResourceCondition that always evaluates to false.

name: WhenNever.new
desc: Creates a condition that always prevents application of the resource operation.

name: shouldApply
desc: Always returns false, indicating the operation should not apply.

name: WhenNone
desc:
A condition that evaluates to true only if both nested conditions
evaluate to false.

name: WhenNone.new
desc:
Creates a composite OR condition that evaluates to true if either
left or right evaluates to false.

name: left
desc: The left-hand condition in the logical disjunction.

name: right
desc: The right-hand condition in the logical disjunction.

name: shouldApply
desc: Creates a composite NOR condition.

name: WhenNot
desc: A negation ResourceCondition that inverts the result of another condition.

name: WhenNot.new
desc: Creates a negation condition that inverts the result of condition.

name: condition
desc: The condition whose result will be negated.

name: shouldApply
desc: Evaluates the condition and returns its logical negation.

name: rate_limit
desc: JetLeaf Rate Limit Library
